entry.title: 2012-02-17 next[-test]
entry.summary: The context is a list of various codes and modifications made to the Bitcoin software. The list starts with the code "849 gavin/testnetmining" and includes 23 other codes, each representing a different modification or update. These codes include fixes for bugs (#852, #715, #553), updates to improve performance (#570, #565, #562), and new features such as the ability to show immature balance (#837) and toggle hide (#855). Each code is attributed to a specific developer or team of developers, including laanwj, sje, sipa, and more. Many of the codes are linked to their respective GitHub pages, where users can find more information about each modification and its purpose. Overall, these codes represent ongoing efforts to improve and update the Bitcoin software, ensuring that it remains secure and efficient for all users.
